Articles.Content: I've been playing Kerbal Space Program for around 6 months, and I thought I'd make an account on the forums today. I haven't gone any further than the Mun, and I am horrible at Career Mode. I also suck at building rockets, so I usually use already built rockets. I am learning (slowly), however.

Hello spacepotato, and welcome to the forums!

There are many [tutorials and guides available here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/54-Tutorials) for both building and flying all manner of craft. There are also many craft available for download from users on the forums.

Happy landings!
It makes me said when new players talk about how terrible they are. Just play and enjoy. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
I can get to minmus but I just learned how to dock, its kinda nessacraiy to make gaint space craft in orbit to fly to other worlds but I haven't yet
